title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 §§ 60-4.0 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 §§ 60-4.0 - Purpose

State Regulations

The purpose of this Subpart is to establish the minimum policy provisions and other requirements with respect to any group policy issued in satisfaction of the financial responsibility requirements of General Business Law article 40 and Insurance Law section 3458. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11
§§
60-4.0

Adopted

New

York State Register February 8, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 06, eff. 2/8/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
